mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, m_name, begin_time, end_time, comment
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM meeting WHERE #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < end_time and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} > begin_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into meeting (create_time, update_time, m_name, begin_time, end_time, comment ) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update meeting
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update meeting set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
